aboutMe.header: YOU WANT TO KNOW MORE ABOUT ME?
aboutMe.description1: Hello, I am Armel Steve OUETCHOUA, a passionate fullstack developer with over three years of experience in creating innovative web solutions. My professional journey has allowed me to work on a wide range of projects, from showcase websites to complex web applications, enabling me to hone my technical skills and design sense.
aboutMe.description2: I am driven by a constant curiosity for new technologies and a desire to adopt best practices to deliver optimal user experiences. In recent years, I have had the privilege of collaborating with exceptional teams on challenging projects, enhancing my ability to innovate and solve technical challenges.
aboutMe.description3: My ambition is to continue learning, evolving, and sharing my knowledge to help businesses achieve their goals. I am always looking for new opportunities to create high-performing and impactful web solutions.

myprojects.subtitle: My Projects
myprojects.experience: Here are some recent projects I have worked on.
